name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Justin Timberlake says there will be no 'N Sync reunion during the Super Bowl. The Patriots are upset because now it means they’ll be the most hated guys on the field.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: It’s come out that President Trump’s director of communications, Hope Hicks, may have partially obstructed justice. Trump said he’s furious with Hicks because he hired her to fully obstruct justice.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: President Trump has decided not to take part in the traditional presidential Super Bowl interview. Apparently, Trump is worried he might not pass the NFL’s concussion protocol.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The preserved forearm of a 16th century saint is on a tour across Canada. And get this... tickets are still available!

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Today is the first day of Black History Month, which is why President Trump gave a shout-out to his three favorite black people: Ben Carson, Omarosa, and Ben Carson.
